snippet: Cisco has "a once in a decade platform." It is a machine that handles 10 times as much mobile Internet traffic as current devices, and pays attention to different kinds of mobile data - a Facebook app on a phone acts differently from a YouTube video....
abstract: Cisco has "a once in a decade platform." It is a machine that handles 10 times as much mobile Internet traffic as current devices, and pays attention to different kinds of mobile data - a Facebook app on a phone acts differently from a YouTube video. Just as important is what it says about Cisco's battle to stay meaningful.
